title: Water soluble curcumin with alkyl sulfonate moiety: Synthesis, and anticancer efficacy

Author(s): Alaa Janem, Ghader Omar, Othman Hamed, Shehdeh Jodeh, Abdalhadi Deghles, Avni Berisha, Waseem Mansour, Saber Abu Jabal, Oswa Fares, Ataa Jaser, Ameed Amireh, Ghaleb Adwan
